DzPickTool Class Reference
[Interface Components]

A view tool for selecting items in the 3D viewport. More...

#include <dzpicktool.h>

Detailed Description

A view tool for selecting items in the 3D viewport.

Subclass Constructor - Subclasses should call this constructor to pass in the name of the tool
